title: An Idea is Emerging
description:
An idea is emerging
that is blurring all the lines
reversing what inspired 
all the curses in the mind
I feel the earth is urgent to reinterpret the signs
And encourage new searches for purpose in this burdened life
For these anointed vessels
The playing fields has been leveled
Neither angels or devils
Can slow it down or help it
I sense a change of temperature
I didn’t learn in seminar
Spirit will go secular
Hidden in a metaphor
I'm inspired, to retire and be quiet and wait
to rewire, an empire an entire mind state
This fire thats acquired inspired by faith
a desire that’s supplying higher ways
Its exquisitely intricate
isn't it?
contradicting history
an innocent blunt instrument 
intimate and spirit lead
here is the difference if it isn't yet obvious
we're defying common sense with divine confidence
7 billion children
Each one of them are different
that’s 7 billion religions
On the planet we live in
Some believe in heaven
some believe in hell
some don’t believe in God 
or even in themselves
But they all believe in music
they all believe in love
Everyone believes in something whether inside or above
I believe I've yet to see the person I'll become
But its somebody I couldn't have ever even dreamed of
This randomness isn't by accident
I've got a scandalous habit of
catching the miraculous
in moments of tragedy
feeling gravity no longer matters
As the limits I once had now have been shattered
Why did I once fear what comes after
When all death will be is a greener pasture
What started as a small seed, 
is now much more indeed
This idea increases, stampeding over me
